meanings.sent1: She was irritated by the loud noise outside.
meanings.sent2: The constant buzzing of the fly irritated her.
meanings.sent3: His irritated expression made her giggle.
meanings.sent4: The dripping faucet was an irritated reminder of the plumbing issue.
meanings.sent5: The scratchy tag in her shirt was incredibly irritated.

meanings.sent1: The irritated customer demanded to speak to the manager.
meanings.sent2: The slow internet connection was an irritated topic of discussion.
meanings.sent3: The malfunctioning printer seemed to have an irritated personality.
meanings.sent4: The traffic jam was an irritated obstacle on their journey.
meanings.sent5: The broken elevator was an irritated inconvenience for the residents.
